title: 客户端进不去,秒掉.  服务端报错看不懂, 有没有大佬解决啊
author: lovely1998
txt_content:
先贴上服务端报错

[Netty IO #1/ERROR] [FML]: NetworkDispatcher exception
java.io.IOException: Connection reset by peer
        at sun.nio.ch.FileDispatcherImpl.read0(Native Method) ~[?:1.8.0_161]
        at sun.nio.ch.SocketDispatcher.read(SocketDispatcher.java:39) ~[?:1.8.0_161]
        at sun.nio.ch.IOUtil.readIntoNativeBuffer(IOUtil.java:223) ~[?:1.8.0_161]
        at sun.nio.ch.IOUtil.read(IOUtil.java:192) ~[?:1.8.0_161]
        at sun.nio.ch.SocketChannelImpl.read(SocketChannelImpl.java:380) ~[?:1.8.0_161]
        at io.netty.buffer.UnpooledUnsafeDirectByteBuf.setBytes(UnpooledUnsafeDirectByteBuf.java:436) ~[UnpooledUnsafeDirectByteBuf.class:?]
        at io.netty.buffer.AbstractByteBuf.writeBytes(AbstractByteBuf.java:870) ~[AbstractByteBuf.class:?]
        at io.netty.channel.socket.nio.NioSocketChannel.doReadBytes(NioSocketChannel.java:208) ~[NioSocketChannel.class:?]
        at io.netty.channel.nio.AbstractNioByteChannel$NioByteUnsafe.read(AbstractNioByteChannel.java:87) [AbstractNioByteChannel$NioByteUnsafe.class:?]
        at io.netty.channel.nio.NioEventLoop.processSelectedKey(NioEventLoop.java:480) [NioEventLoop.class:?]
        at io.netty.channel.nio.NioEventLoop.processSelectedKeysOptimized(NioEventLoop.java:447) [NioEventLoop.class:?]
        at io.netty.channel.nio.NioEventLoop.run(NioEventLoop.java:341) [NioEventLoop.class:?]
        at io.netty.util.concurrent.SingleThreadEventExecutor$2.run(SingleThreadEventExecutor.java:101) [SingleThreadEventExecutor$2.class:?]
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:748) [?:1.8.0_161]
[19:46:21] [Server thread/INFO]: jssd lost connection: TranslatableComponent
{key='disconnect.genericReason', args=[Internal Exception: java.io.IOException: Connection reset by peer], siblings=[], style=Style{hasParent=false, color=null, bold=null, italic=null, underlined=null, obfuscated=null, clickEvent=null, hoverEvent=null}}


表示完全看不懂这是个什么鬼......
在线等,挺急的.....

[qq]1624022009[/qq]

replies.author: dogeop
replies.txt_content: Connection reset by peer，这是客户端网络不太好，丢失连接了吧。

replies.author: lovely1998
replies.txt_content:
dogeop 发表于 2018-1-23 21:29
Connection reset by peer，这是客户端网络不太好，丢失连接了吧。
不是这个原因,  网络挺好的.  我和我朋友玩过一阵子.  但是后来我们再登, 服务端就会报这个错.  我们俩都登不上去. ...
